name: Franken-Crime
description:
How to play

  • Click on a part of a patient to transfer that part to the other patient.
  • Click on the trash can to "throw out" a patient.
  • You lose if a patient dies or if you throw out too many patients.

Save patients by transferring organs and bones between them.  Don't let a patient die! Instead refuse to treat them!

Made for the 2020 8-Bit Retro Game Jam

Palette: Steam Lords by Slynyrd
